'''''La Conexion Española de J.R.R. Tolkien: El Tío "Curro"''''' ("J.R.R. Tolkien's Spanish Connection: Uncle 'Curro'") is a Spanish-language biography about [[Francis Xavier Morgan]], with an emphasis on his relationship to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>{{webcite|author="juanito panchacoco"|articleurl=http://groups.yahoo.com/group/mythsoc/message/24179|articlename=A biography of Fr. Francis is published (#24179)|dated=25 March 2013|website=[http://groups.yahoo.com/group/mythsoc/ Mythsoc mailing list]|accessed=25 March 2013}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.logintegral-libros.com/index.php?editorial=Editorial-CSED&libro=LA-CONEXION-ESPANOLA-DE-JRR-TOLKIEN|articlename=LA CONEXIÓN ESPAÑOLA DE J.R.R. TOLKIEN|dated=|website=[http://www.logintegral-libros.com/ Logintegral-Libros.com]|accessed=25 March 2013}}</ref> The book was both reedited in Spanish and translated into English by Luna Press Publishing.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.lunapresspublishing.com/product-page/uncle-curro-j-r-r-tolkien-s-spanish-connection|articlename="Uncle Curro". J.R.R. Tolkien's Spanish Connection|dated=|website=[http://www.lunapresspublishing.com Luna Press Publishing]|accessed=5 July 2019}}</ref>

**20. Tolkien y el Cardenal Newman

**22. Barriles de contrabando
